if(scriptaddstart==1,

cr1=[[1.414214,0],[1.403062,0.177248],[1.369783,0.351701],[1.314903,0.520607],[1.239285,0.681303],[1.144123,0.831254],[1.030917,0.968096],[0.901454,1.08967],[0.757774,1.19406],[0.602143,1.279619],[0.437016,1.344997],[0.264997,1.389164],[0.088799,1.411423],[-0.088799,1.411423],[-0.264997,1.389164],[-0.437016,1.344997],[-0.602143,1.279619],[-0.757774,1.19406],[-0.901454,1.08967],[-1.030917,0.968096],[-1.144123,0.831254],[-1.239285,0.681303],[-1.314903,0.520607],[-1.369783,0.351701],[-1.403062,0.177248],[-1.414214,0],[-1.403062,-0.177248],[-1.369783,-0.351701],[-1.314903,-0.520607],[-1.239285,-0.681303],[-1.144123,-0.831254],[-1.030917,-0.968096],[-0.901454,-1.08967],[-0.757774,-1.19406],[-0.602143,-1.279619],[-0.437016,-1.344997],[-0.264997,-1.389164],[-0.088799,-1.411423],[0.088799,-1.411423],[0.264997,-1.389164],[0.437016,-1.344997],[0.602143,-1.279619],[0.757774,-1.19406],[0.901454,-1.08967],[1.030917,-0.968096],[1.144123,-0.831254],[1.239285,-0.681303],[1.314903,-0.520607],[1.369783,-0.351701],[1.403062,-0.177248],[1.414214,0]];

ag1=[[0.25,0],[0.248267,0.029384],[0.243092,0.058361],[0.234548,0.086529],[0.222752,0.113498],[0.207867,0.138893],[0.190101,0.162362],[0.1697,0.183581],[0.146946,0.202254],[0.122155,0.218124],[0.095671,0.23097],[0.06786,0.240614],[0.039109,0.246922],[0.009815,0.249807],[-0.019615,0.249229],[-0.048773,0.245196],[-0.077254,0.237764],[-0.104665,0.227036],[-0.130625,0.21316],[-0.154773,0.196329],[-0.176777,0.176777]];
mag1=[0.137766,0.332597];

scriptaddstart=0;
);

 Setadjust([0,0],1.2);
 pag1=Adjust(ag1);
 pmag1=Adjust(pmag1);
 
 Setwindow([-2,2],[-2,2]);
 p0=[0,0]; p1=[sqrt(2),0];
 pP=sqrt(2)*[cos(3/4*pi),sin(3/4*pi)];
 pp0=Adjust(p0); pp1=Adjust(p1);
 ppP=Adjust(pP);
 Listplot("pcr1",Adjust(cr1));
 Listplot("p1",[pp0,ppP],["Color=red"]);
 Expr(ppP,"nw","(-1,1)");
 Listplot("pag1",pag1);
 Expr(pmag1,"c","225{}^{\circ}");
 Expr(pp1,"s1e1","\sqrt{2}");
 xyax();
